ComicInfo.Title: Bad Moon Rising
ComicInfo.Summary: The group, now with Dan in charge, decide to leave the farmhouse. King Zombie soon discovers that Deake has trouble completing the spell as he doesn't have the necessary books. Dan informs the group that he now seems to have some kind of sensory perception towards zombies and knows when they are nearby. The others are doubtful until Dan leads them to where the gate opening is going to occur. Deake begins the ritual and Dan realizes that he can't save Deake, so he must evrything and kill him to prevent the gate opening.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-30 15:18:29. [CVDB302290]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Vincent Locke, Vince Locke, Vincent Locke
ComicInfo.Inker: Vincent Locke, Vince Locke, Vincent Locke
